content:
222 U.S. citizens hold 1.81 TRILLION dollars in student loans, and yet we don't have the talent to support corporate needs AND we need to import 600,000 Chinese students or half of the colleges will go bankrupt?? posted 5 hours ago by Ross190 15 comments award share download report block
15 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Callsign_Fox1 6 points 5 hours ago Deals a deal. We agreed to import 600k China men so we could take over the Tok and Crack down on well you know. permalink award report block reply sobriquet 5 points 4 hours ago Anti-juden speech?  Speech which is perfectly legitimate and legal under the constitution? Naw, we'll just send more weapons and money. permalink parent award report block reply PapaPepe 5 points 5 hours ago We should not take any foreign students anymore I don't care where they are from. permalink award report block reply sobriquet 4 points 4 hours ago Someone has been selling the kids a defective product. permalink award report block reply tw0scoops 3 points 4 hours ago Colleges wouldn't go bankrupt if they fired all the professors teaching gender nonsense and unicorn farts permalink award report block reply greatpumpkin 3 points 3 hours ago There's a certain amount of truth here. Someone with a PhD in interpretive dance theory has about the same employability as a former psychic hotline operator. Having said that, I cannot believe we lack enough home grown young men that, with a little OJT, can do whatever the fuck needs doing. permalink award report block reply Crucible 3 points 5 hours ago At least we got TikTok in the deal. permalink award report block reply LordKuroTheGreat 2 points 4 hours ago And now that we have that, we can make sure it doesn't subvert our own culture or unfairly bias the youth to a foreign nation's preferred way of thinking. snicker permalink parent award report block reply fluffykitten 3 points 4 hours ago How did we get from $100,000 per H1B visa to this? permalink award report block reply Beat_to_Quarters 2 points 3 hours ago How much of that student debt is from stupid, useless degrees?  Some graduates are absolutely getting screwed over and some have gone into debt to buy a gender studies degree. permalink award report block reply someguy7738 2 points 3 hours ago All that student loan debt should simply be canceled and China and India handed the bill. permalink award report block reply lizardo221 1 points 2 hours ago This is rather simple to understand: the Chinese students all pay up front typically, no questions asked. It's easy money that feeds all these institutions. permalink award report block reply Shitsbrokeyo 1 points 3 hours ago Np need for gender, dei and women's studies in the labor market. Especially tech sector permalink award report block reply mathteach314159 1 points 6 minutes ago Fuck the colleges. I really wish Trump seized this opportunity for the racket to go tits up, allowing for something better to fill the space. permalink award report block reply
Callsign_Fox1 6 points 5 hours ago Deals a deal. We agreed to import 600k China men so we could take over the Tok and Crack down on well you know. permalink award report block reply sobriquet 5 points 4 hours ago Anti-juden speech?  Speech which is perfectly legitimate and legal under the constitution? Naw, we'll just send more weapons and money. permalink parent award report block reply
sobriquet 5 points 4 hours ago Anti-juden speech?  Speech which is perfectly legitimate and legal under the constitution? Naw, we'll just send more weapons and money. permalink parent award report block reply
PapaPepe 5 points 5 hours ago We should not take any foreign students anymore I don't care where they are from. permalink award report block reply
sobriquet 4 points 4 hours ago Someone has been selling the kids a defective product. permalink award report block reply
tw0scoops 3 points 4 hours ago Colleges wouldn't go bankrupt if they fired all the professors teaching gender nonsense and unicorn farts permalink award report block reply
greatpumpkin 3 points 3 hours ago There's a certain amount of truth here. Someone with a PhD in interpretive dance theory has about the same employability as a former psychic hotline operator. Having said that, I cannot believe we lack enough home grown young men that, with a little OJT, can do whatever the fuck needs doing. permalink award report block reply
Crucible 3 points 5 hours ago At least we got TikTok in the deal. permalink award report block reply LordKuroTheGreat 2 points 4 hours ago And now that we have that, we can make sure it doesn't subvert our own culture or unfairly bias the youth to a foreign nation's preferred way of thinking. snicker permalink parent award report block reply
LordKuroTheGreat 2 points 4 hours ago And now that we have that, we can make sure it doesn't subvert our own culture or unfairly bias the youth to a foreign nation's preferred way of thinking. snicker permalink parent award report block reply
fluffykitten 3 points 4 hours ago How did we get from $100,000 per H1B visa to this? permalink award report block reply
Beat_to_Quarters 2 points 3 hours ago How much of that student debt is from stupid, useless degrees?  Some graduates are absolutely getting screwed over and some have gone into debt to buy a gender studies degree. permalink award report block reply
someguy7738 2 points 3 hours ago All that student loan debt should simply be canceled and China and India handed the bill. permalink award report block reply
lizardo221 1 points 2 hours ago This is rather simple to understand: the Chinese students all pay up front typically, no questions asked. It's easy money that feeds all these institutions. permalink award report block reply
Shitsbrokeyo 1 points 3 hours ago Np need for gender, dei and women's studies in the labor market. Especially tech sector permalink award report block reply
mathteach314159 1 points 6 minutes ago Fuck the colleges. I really wish Trump seized this opportunity for the racket to go tits up, allowing for something better to fill the space. permalink award report block reply
